transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello?
Customer: Hello? Yeah?
Executive: Ah sir, good evening, good evening sir. Njaney Kittanan India Mart back end team ninne.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir, sir nammude concern njan kandayirunnu. So athine related ayittatte njan sirine ippo vilichathu. So nammude profileil ninne mottham analyze cheythaayirunnu sir back end team ninne. So actually sir vicharikkunna reethiyilulla oru third party nammude profile angine use cheyyunnilla.
Customer: So athine regardingil sirine kurach detailsum kaaryangalum okke njan nammude team ninne WhatsAppilo mailil okke ayachaayirunnu. Sir athu kandayirunno sir?
Customer: Njan already oru kaaryam chodichaayirunnu, IP address. Ithuvare enikku athu kittittilla.
Executive: IP address?
Customer: Athe. Okay, aa athu njan kandayirunnu sir, IP address. IP address ayachaayirunnu. Aaha. Okay ningal aa athu vannittu wrong aayirunno. Appo njan chodichappo njan pinne correct ayachu tharam ennu paranju, paranju moonu naalu divasam ithuvare kittittilla.
Executive: Okay okay, IP address parayu. Enth sir?
Customer: Ningalude sideil onnum cheythittilla. Njan ente sideil onnum cheythittilla. Appo who did it?
Executive: Okay okay. Appo saarinte profile ingane oru activity undennulla kaaryam saaru manassilaakkiyaayirunnu alle? Pakshe nammude sideil nokkiyappozhathekkum angane reethiyilulla oru activities undaayittilla.
Customer: Njan ayacha mail kandayirunno?
Executive: Aa kandayirunnu sir, kandayirunnu.
Customer: Athinakathu ethra posting undennu kandayirunno? Almost close around nine or ten postings okke.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Appo athu engane vannathu?
Executive: Okay, saar saarinekkooduthal vere aarengilum nammude India Mart use cheyyuthundo sir?
Customer: Illa.
Executive: Illa alle? Okay okay. It is not at all related to my product.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm, okay sir okay.
Customer: Okay sir. Mumbaiyilum ithu happen cheythittundu.
Executive: Engane sir, voice break aayippoyi?
Customer: This thing happened in Mumbai also.
Executive: Oh okay. Oru oralae contact actually vannittu they are asking for a Mumbai suppliers or something like that. Appo athu aarannu cheyyunnathu? Ee question aanu oru kazhinja randaazhcha aayittu njangade teaminodu chodichondirikkunnathu. If you don't know the answer then what is the point in doing business?
Executive: Okay, saaru chodicha reethiyilulla oru IP address nammude head officeil nammal chodichaayirunnu. Avarathu refer cheythondirikkukayaanu. So athinu kurach procedureum kaaryangalum okke undu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: So athu athu once njan athu update vannu kazhiyumbolathekkum njan njan saarine vilichu njan inform cheythaalam sir. So kuzhappamilla saarinte profile nammude sideil monitoril aanu ullathu. Njan ini engane continue cheyyaan njaan yaathoru thaalpparyamilla. I am not gonna do any more business transaction with you guys. So this is the last thing.
Executive: Sir saaru angane parayanda nammal maximum nammal nokkunnundu.
Customer: Ningalude sideil ningalkku thanne illenkil pinne namukkaano ullathu?
Executive: Manassilaayi sir, manassilaayi.
Customer: You guys don't know anything about that. Chodichu kazhinjaal njangade sideil ellam clear aanennu parayuka. Ningalude sideil clear aanenkil pinne how is this happening? And you couldn't even trace out even after two weeks. What exactly happened? Then what is the point in doing business?
Executive: Sir sir parayunnathu manassilaavunnundu pakshe nammude sideil ninnu njaan oru sideil argue cheyyaan varunne. Oru pennampille vilichu avarum argue cheyyaana varunne. Njangade side correct aanu. Ningalude side correct aanenkil pinne prove us that you guys are correct in this thing. Why even after two weeks you you don't have any proof?
Customer: Nammal cheythittundenkil pinne njangal kashtappettu ningalude aduthu contact cheyyanamo?
Executive: Sheriyaanu sir, sir parayunnathu manassilaavunnundu. Contact cheyyendathu aavashyamaano?
Customer: Sheriyaanu sir, sheriyaanu sir. Saarinte concern ivide ippo bhayankara issue aayittu ingane pokkondirikkukayaanu. Kaaranam ithupole oru third party usage nammude oru profileil nokkuvaanennu oru concern varumbolathekkum athu clear aayittu nokkunnundu.
Customer: I have serious doubt that you guys are doing your own promotions.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Okay sir, okay sir. I have serious doubt.
Executive: Manassilaayi sir, manassilaayi sir. So ippo nokki ippo ee oru update aanu namukku nilavil managementinte ithil ninnu vannittullathu. Ippo saaru paranja reethiyilulla oru concern parayunnapole matte IP address angane enthengilum kittunnundennundengil athu nammal already saarinte mail mooliyam avaru nokkiyittundu. IP address njaan njaanalla chodichathu. Ningalude team thanneyaanu ithaanu IP address ennu paranjitta vannathu. Njan IP address chodichappo IP address wrong aanu. Athu koduthappo parayaan correct IP address. Appo you guys are only initiating everything and then giving a wrong picture. Then what is the point in it? Back end teaminennu oru message mail vannu ellam correct aanu IP address ee IP address aanennu paranjathu. And that IP address itself is a wrong one.
Customer: Saaru angane reethiyilulla oru recruitment post cheythittilla alle?
Customer: Njan IP addressum chodichittilla. Enikku athinte answer aanu chodichathu. Athinaan answer vannittu ningalude relationship managerinnoru lady angandu oru IP address eduthu ayachittundu ithil ninna post cheythu ennu paranju. Njan athu nokkiyappo IP address wrong aanu. Avarodu paranju ayyo sorry maybe set aayittu vannathaayirikkum njaan eduthu tharam ennu paranju. Pakshe chodichu paranju varaazhcha ithuvare vannittilla.
Executive: Okay sir, okay sir. Njan enthaanenkilum saarinte account manager aayittum discuss cheythittu athe pole nammude head officeil ninnu varunna update prakaaram njan saarine njan vilichittu kaaryangal parayaam. Enthengilum enthengilum kaaryangal saarinte sideil ninnu ariyanamennundengil ee numberil vilichaal mathi. Enthengilum issue undenkil. Enikku ini ithinakathu ini oru thaalpparyavumilla. Munpottu pokaan vendittu. Because that's how you are ethengilum oru problem undaayi kazhinjaal ningalude sideil ninnulla response ippo kandappozhathekkum manassilaayi. Ini ithukondu munpottu poyittu vishayamilla.
Customer: Kaaryam onnumilla. Already enikku valiyaayittu buyleadsum kaaryangalum onnumilla. Pinne on top of that this is another thing. Athu sideil ninnu munpottu continue cheyyaan. Only thing renewal timeil maathram ellaarum varum call cheyyaan. Aa head officeil ninnu ulppade aarendokkeyo uththaranmaar vannu request cheyyaan athu cheyyithu cheyyithu ennu paranjittu. Once renewal is done ennu athraye ullu. Then just leave it and go. And then next year again they used to come. Ithaa eppozhum ellaa varshavum nadannukondirikkunne. And on top of that this is also happening so I don't want to continue this anymore. So that's end of the story.
Customer: Okay, njaan ini engane munpottu pokaan? Because njaan already moonu working dayikkullil enikku oru revert chodichittundaayirunnu. Ithuvare two weeks aayi ithuvare oru oru favorable response vannittilla. Then we'll wait and we'll might we'll go with legal.
Customer: That's it.
Executive: Okay sir, okay sir. Enthaayalum njaan nokkittu saarine njaan enthaanenkilum morningil thanne njaan update cheyyaam sir.
Customer: Aayikotte.
Executive: Ippo samayam office hours kazhinjaayathu kondu ippo ente head officilekku ee oru kaaryangal regarding ithu samsaarikaanaayittulla aalkkaar avide kaanilla. Maybe avaru poyittundaavum.
Customer: Okay. Sure.
Executive: Njaan morning saarine njaan update cheyyaam sir.
Customer: Okay. Bye.
Executive: Okay, thank you sir, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's profile used by a third party.

- IP address provided was incorrect.

- Mumbai suppliers asking for details.

- No favorable response after two weeks.



Resolution:

- Executive said profile is being monitored.

- Executive will discuss with account manager.

- Executive will call back with updates.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ip address, third party, profile, mumbai suppliers
